free.name: WRC Generations - Peugeot 206 WRC 2002
free.detailed_description:
24 wins, 3 manufacturers' titles, 2 drivers' titles… the Peugeot 206 left a big mark in its era and was driven by top drivers such as Marcus Grönholm and Gilles Panizzi.
With WRC Generations, you can get behind the wheel of this iconic car and experience the extreme sensations it was famous for.

4 cylinders, 300hp and 1,230kg.

free.name: Need for Speed™ Payback: Pontiac Firebird & Aston Martin DB5 Superbuild Bundle
free.detailed_description: Two iconic cars that made quite the impression on the silver screen are now available for you to take for a ride in Fortune Valley. Both can be customized into outstanding superbuilds!

free.name: Limited Digital Bonus - Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch
free.detailed_description:
In this pack, you'll find:

- An additional horse breed, the "Irish Cob", perfect for enriching your stable
- 3 magnificent Knight's tack sets for your horses
- 3 new outfits for your avatar
- An exclusive hairstyle for your avatar

free.name: Unicorn Tack Set - Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch
free.detailed_description:
Add a touch of fantasy to your stable!

Discover 3 magnificent unicorn tack sets for your horses.
